1616664124_1GooUE19488nDwG3TdkM8seYAHct4.body: I want to help too but I only know html and css. But I am shilling zeronet everywhere in order to get people to migrate. I can certainly try to shill that you're looking for coders; I imagine there are plenty of individuals willing to contribute. It's just hard to find this place. We need a small army of zeronet shills to market the shit out of this place.
